page.title: 18BUSES AND TRANSPORT
page.content: In Mylor,alot of people commented that the buses should be more frequent.The buses come every other hour 9.30/11.30 There is only one bus stop in Mylor but there was no bus stop sign.(The buses had not changed much over the past years).Alot of people in Mylor have their own car so the bus is not used too often.The bus is a double decker.A survey was taken to see how many vehicles went through the main street in 15 minutes.The results were as follows Cars=21 lorries=2 and buses 1.The car is the most common vehicle in Mylor.Most people used the buses either once a week or very rarely.Only a few people used the bus regulary because they did not have any other means of transport.
